articles.author: Richard Engel, Marc Smith, Yuliya Talmazan
articles.title: Taliban parade new weapons seized from Afghan military as U.S. withdraws - NBC News
articles.description: As American forces withdraw from Afghanistan, the Taliban's unrelenting march may be gathering pace with district after district falling to the militants.
articles.content: KABUL, Afghanistan The Taliban have showed off containers full of weapons and military hardware seized from the Afghan military as American forces withdraw from the country and the militants march ac… [+5600 chars]

articles.author: Madeline Holcombe, CNN
articles.title: These parts of the US could become 'breeding grounds' for potentially more Covid-19 variants, expert says - CNN
articles.description: Out of the Covid-19 pandemic, two Americans are emerging: One protected by vaccines and the other still vulnerable to infection -- and experts say progress made across the entire US is being threatened by low-vaccinated regions.

articles.title: Cannes Launches With COVID Confusion and ‘Disgusting’ Saliva Tests That Require Festival-Goers to Spit in a Tube - Variety
